meanings.definition: The quality of happening by chance or accident.
meanings.sent1: The fortuitousness of finding a four-leaf clover made her day.
meanings.sent2: She attributed her success to the fortuitousness of being in the right place at the right time.
meanings.sent3: The fortuitousness of the situation left everyone laughing at the unexpected outcome.
meanings.sent4: The fortuitousness of their encounter felt like fate had intervened in their lives.
meanings.sent5: The fortuitousness of the rainbow after the storm brought a sense of hope to the villagers.

meanings.definition: The state of being fortunate or lucky.
meanings.sent1: His fortuitousness in winning the lottery was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent2: She believed in the fortuitousness of finding a penny heads up on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent3: The fortuitousness of his good luck seemed to follow him wherever he went.
meanings.sent4: The fortuitousness of her charm brought her many admirers.
meanings.sent5: The fortuitousness of the sunny weather on their wedding day made it even more special.
